description: Good environmental governance based increasingly on policy, legal and regulatory frameworks and actions that are more likely to protect natural resources as well as livelihoods with minimum threshold of national action on climate change achieved.

subproject.description: The project provides support to environmental governance through the Federal Ministry of Environment by increasing public awareness policy, legal and regulatory reforms to improve protection of natural resources and sustainable livelihoods. It will also put in place a functioning normative, policy and institutional framework so that the social and economic costs of natural resource use are fully reflected in policy and action.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Fed Environmental Governance
